dialog.text: Morning %you.first_name%, was up late last night gaming with Pete again.  How's you?

joins.text: If I can help, let me know.

dialog.text: I was looking at the big-O stuff Tom was telling us about.  Wtf?  I understood none of that, did you?
If that is some of the simple stuff, what's the hard stuff gonna be like!  Ah, time to have a break.  Catch you later!
